postings.body: Enjoy a fall vacation in a beautiful cottage where you can relax on the water and enjoy the view. This is perfect for fall fisherman, leaf peepers and tours of the wineries. Hunters can enjoy their evenings here while they spend their days hunting the thousands of acres of state land nearby. This cottage is clean, bright, modern, and it is right on the water just 3 miles north of Hammondsport. Walk out onto a large water-level dock that creates additional outdoor living space (no steps). Lots of docking available for boats or other watercraft. Minutes away from wineries. Sleeps 11 (2 bedrooms in main house plus a detached bungalow, 2 of the bedrooms have bunks with doubles on the bottom and a single on the top, one bedroom has a double bed, there is a double sleeper sofa in the living room, and a futon on the enclosed porch for additional sleeping). There is a full bathroom in the cottage and a 1/2 bath in the bungalow. There is parking for four vehicles with only a few steps down to the cottage. Close to Hammondsport restaurants and activities. The cottage is fully stocked with linens, dishware, and cooking appliances. There is also a gas grill, fire pit, and lots of outdoor furniture for your enjoyment. You will totally relax in this cottage. Enjoy the beautiful foliage this Fall. Three wineries are within five miles (Heron Hill, Bully Hill, & Dr. Franks). Rent is $500 for a weekend (Fri to Sun). Additional nights are $100 per night The cottage is available until the end of October. This cottage rents quickly.
